alert.note: Alert for Shackelford; Throckmorton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 13 at 8:11PM CDT until May 13 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SHACKELFORD AND SOUTHEASTERN THROCKMORTON COUNTIES... At 810 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Fort Griffin, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. This severe storm will be near... Albany around 900 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Lusk, Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line and The Intersection Of Us- 283 And Ranch Road 209. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
